mapper.insert: insert into book_member(name, email, pwd, photo) values(#{name}, #{email}, password(#{password}), #{photo})
mapper.select: select member_id, name, email, cdt from book_member
select member_id, name, email, pwd, photo, cdt from book_member where member_id=#{no}
select member_id, name, email, cdt from book_member where name like #{keywordPattern} or email like #{keywordPattern}
select member_id, name, email, pwd, photo from book_member where email=#{email} and pwd=password(#{password})
